attributes.action: MPs to discuss blocking the Leave the EU vote
attributes.additional_details:
MPs should discuss this using evidence &the referendum result

Huge numbers of people(EU citizens living in the UK,those under 18)& countries who will be significantly affected had no say

1)that money currently spent on EU membership could be spent on the NHS has been denied(http://ind.pn/28UD5V0),the value of markets & shares has decreased by £billions counteracting the amount we would have invested in the EU in coming years

MPs can block the vote: http://bbc.in/1GnpkYD, http://bit.ly/28QXsA9
attributes.background: As leaving will have a huge impact on the EU, but was only voted for by the UK, that a vast proportion of experts have outlined significant negative implications, & that the VoteLeave campaign contained huge inaccuracies & misrepresentations(1), MPs should discuss whether to block the vote to leave.
